title: micromen
author: micromen
content: [AUCTION] Bitcoin Penny Special Limited Edition Silver Roll! (2019) Lot 1 - Bitcoin Penny Special Limited Edition Silver Roll! (40 coins)The beauty of this box and roll is very hard to capture on cameraThere is a bit of tarnish on the most outside coins of the rollSTARTING BID: 0.01BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001BTCEND TIME: July 5th, 2023 22:00 UTCSNIPE: Any bid made in last 15 minutes will extend the auction for that lot 15 minutes beyond the previous ending time.Excluded from Bidding: I may exclude/disqualify bidders, or require a deposit, for any bidders at my sole discretion.PAYMENT : I will post payment address in this thread after auction ends.SHIPPING: Based on location and preference. Item ships from EuropeEscrow accepted, Buyer covers escrow fees.If you have any questions or would like more pictures, please do not hesitate to ask ¬†I am hosting this auction on behalf of the owner. I'm in full charge of the entire process and the item is in my possession. Shipping will also be handled by myself.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Lot 1: 0.01 BTCThat's a really sexy woodcase. Is this exclusive for these rolls or was it used for other items, too?Any numbers on mintage of these special edition rolls?

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on June 27, 2023, 11:11:59 PMLot 1: 0.01 BTCThat's a really sexy woodcase. Is this exclusive for these rolls or was it used for other items, too?Any numbers on mintage of these special edition rolls? Those boxes were made by @BG4, aka Mr. Papersafe. He did a monero box, & I think he did a box for Nastyfans, and the BTC penny boxes... Not sure if more were made. His laser engraving work is stellar on these for sure.  I had him make me a Monero box fora ¬†Lealana 3-coin set, and at the time I paid him 1 BTC for the box. (around/under 1k per BTC at the time, can't really remember but know it wasn't more than 700 bucks or so in btc at the time). ... My my how times have changed! Love it , and good to see you micromen, hit me up sometime on the telegram - had great times meeting you with @zeph in 2018.. Edit - My 2019 roll looks literally the same on the tarnish.

comments.author: BitcoinPenny
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on June 27, 2023, 11:27:45 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on June 27, 2023, 11:11:59 PMThat's a really sexy woodcase... Those boxes were made by @BG4, aka Mr. Papersafe. He did a monero box, & I think he did a box for Nastyfans, and the BTC penny boxes... Not sure if more were made. His laser engraving work is stellar on these for sure.  Just a quick clarification and personal note...Clarification: These particular boxes were not made by BG4. They were made specially for us by a custom box company of high regard. Although, as noted by owlcatz above, the quality is quite stellar and equal to that of BG4's own custom pieces.Personal Note: We need to commission more of these boxes. They are absolutely lovely and handcrafted to heirloom quality. Congratulations to its newest owner! Regards,Chris@TBPCo.
